newSolutionTitle: Relax and rejuvenate with our professional massage services
newSolutionDesc: Our massage services are designed for deep body relaxation, tension relief, and restoring mental harmony. Whether you're looking for an intensive deep tissue massage or a gentle aromatherapy session, we offer personalized treatments tailored to your unique needs, promoting overall well-being and inner balance.
name: Name
benefitsTitle: Massage – the best thing you can do for your body
benefitsDesc_1: Relieve muscle tension, forget about back pain, and feel lightness in your body.
benefitsDesc_2: Feel how massage stimulates blood circulation, filling your body with energy and restoring strength.
benefitsDesc_3: Free your mind from tension and stress, giving yourself moments of peace and harmony.
benefitsDesc_4: Leave fatigue behind and feel lightness in your body after a relaxing massage.
servicesTitle: A variety of massage types: find your path to well-being and relaxation

foot.name: Foot Massage
foot.desc_1: Helps relax muscles and relieve accumulated tension, especially beneficial after a long day of standing or walking.
foot.desc_2: Promotes better blood circulation in the legs, aiding in oxygen and nutrient delivery to tissues while removing waste and toxins.
foot.desc_3: Improves lymphatic drainage and reduces swelling, especially useful for those experiencing leg swelling after prolonged sitting or standing.
foot.desc_4: Encourages muscle relaxation, softens leg muscles, and enhances joint mobility, making it especially beneficial for athletes and physically active individuals.
foot.desc_5: Reduces fatigue and heaviness in the legs, helping them recover after extended exertion, making steps lighter and movements more comfortable.
foot.desc_6: Stimulates nerve endings in the feet, promoting overall relaxation and stress reduction, which helps improve well-being and sleep quality.

hand.name: Hand Massage
hand.desc_1: Helps relax tense muscles and relieve fatigue after a long day of work or intense physical activity.
hand.desc_2: Stimulates blood circulation in the hands, delivering more oxygen and nutrients to the cells, improving their function.
hand.desc_3: Reduces stress and anxiety levels, promoting relaxation and improving mood.
hand.desc_4: Enhances joint mobility and flexibility, reducing stiffness and improving overall hand functionality.
hand.desc_5: Reduces swelling and improves lymphatic drainage, especially beneficial for those who spend a lot of time with tense hands or wrists.
hand.desc_6: Helps alleviate pain and discomfort in chronic hand conditions such as arthritis or tendonitis, improving mobility and reducing inflammation.

honey.name: Honey Massage
honey.desc_1: Enhances blood circulation in the area where honey is applied.
honey.desc_2: Improves oxygen and nutrient supply to tissues while aiding in the removal of waste and toxins, promoting regeneration and overall health.
honey.desc_3: Has a relaxing effect on the body, reducing stress and tension.
honey.desc_4: The warmth of honey and massage movements help relieve tension and stress, contributing to overall relaxation and mood improvement.
honey.desc_5: Honey contains numerous nutrients and antioxidants that have beneficial effects on the skin.
honey.desc_6: Honey massage helps nourish and hydrate the skin, making it softer, more elastic, and radiant.

cupping.name: Cupping Massage
cupping.desc_1: Stimulates blood circulation in the area where cups are applied.
cupping.desc_2: Has a relaxing effect on the body.
cupping.desc_3: Promotes the stimulation of collagen and elastin in the skin, helping to improve its tone and elasticity.
cupping.desc_4: Helps relax muscles, relieve tension and stress, improving overall well-being and mood.
cupping.desc_5: An effective method for fighting cellulite. The vacuum created by the cups improves blood circulation and lymphatic drainage, helping to break down fat deposits and enhance skin texture.
cupping.desc_6: Has a stimulating effect on internal organs, supporting their function and improving overall health.

classic.name: Classic Body Massage
classic.desc_1: Helps relax muscles, releasing accumulated tension.
classic.desc_2: Improves blood circulation, which enhances tissue and organ nourishment.
classic.desc_3: Enhances circulation, promoting better oxygen and nutrient delivery to the body.
classic.desc_4: Leaves a deep sense of relaxation and tranquility.
classic.desc_5: Reduces stress and anxiety by providing a soothing effect, improving overall mood.
classic.desc_6: Increases flexibility and mobility, as regular massage helps improve muscle and joint elasticity.

facial.name: Facial Massage
facial.desc_1: Stimulates blood flow to the skin, enhancing oxygen and nutrient delivery to skin cells.
facial.desc_2: Improves skin tone and texture while promoting regeneration and overall skin health.
facial.desc_3: Relaxes facial muscles, reducing accumulated tension and stress, which can help improve mood and alleviate anxiety.
facial.desc_4: Boosts collagen and elastin production, two essential components responsible for skin firmness and youthfulness.
facial.desc_5: Enhances lymphatic drainage, helping to remove toxins and improve skin condition.
facial.desc_6: Reduces puffiness and improves circulation around the eyes, minimizing dark circles and swelling.

backNack.name: Back and Neck Massage
backNack.desc_1: Relaxes muscles and improves blood circulation, relieving tension and promoting deeper relaxation.
backNack.desc_2: Effectively alleviates pain caused by muscle tension, osteochondrosis, or other back issues.
backNack.desc_3: Gentle stretching and massage movements help reduce pain and enhance mobility.
backNack.desc_4: Supports spinal alignment, strengthens back muscles, and helps prevent potential deformities.
backNack.desc_5: Stimulates overall blood circulation and lymphatic drainage, improving oxygen and nutrient delivery to cells.
backNack.desc_6: Encourages the release of endorphins, the 'happiness hormones,' which help reduce stress, improve mood, combat insomnia, and enhance sleep quality.

relax.name: Relaxing Massage
relax.desc_1: Helps reduce stress and tension in the body by stimulating nerve endings that send relaxation signals to the brain.
relax.desc_2: Eases muscle tension, improves blood circulation and flexibility, reducing muscle and joint pain while enhancing posture and mobility.
relax.desc_3: Supports lymphatic drainage, aiding in the removal of toxins and waste from the body, promoting overall health and a stronger immune system.
relax.desc_4: Enhances sleep quality and duration by reducing insomnia, calming the nervous system, and creating a state of peace and relaxation.
relax.desc_5: Relieves emotional tension, improves mood, and enhances overall emotional well-being by stimulating the release of endorphins—the 'happiness hormones.'
relax.desc_6: Boosts concentration and mental clarity by relieving mental fatigue, improving focus, and enhancing overall cognitive performance.

neckShoulder.name: Neck and Shoulder Massage
neckShoulder.desc_1: Relaxes the muscles of the neck and upper back, making it especially beneficial for those with sedentary jobs or repetitive tasks.
neckShoulder.desc_2: Improves mobility in the cervical spine, helping individuals who experience restricted movement in the neck area.
neckShoulder.desc_3: Eases headaches and neck pain caused by muscle tension and stress buildup.
neckShoulder.desc_4: Stimulates blood circulation in the neck area, enhancing oxygen and nutrient supply to tissues.
neckShoulder.desc_5: Has a calming effect on the nervous system, reducing stress and tension while promoting relaxation.
neckShoulder.desc_6: Alleviates fatigue and enhances overall well-being by restoring energy levels and improving productivity.

sport.name: Sports Massage
sport.desc_1: Enhances physical performance by improving blood circulation, expanding blood vessels, and increasing oxygen and nutrient delivery to muscles, boosting strength, endurance, and flexibility.
sport.desc_2: Speeds up recovery after training and competitions by removing metabolic waste, reducing muscle tension and fatigue, and accelerating tissue healing after injuries.
sport.desc_3: Acts as an effective injury prevention method by correcting muscle imbalances, improving flexibility and coordination, and strengthening muscles, tendons, and ligaments, reducing the risk of injuries.
sport.desc_4: Relieves muscle tension and spasms, enhancing joint mobility and overall flexibility—especially beneficial for athletes experiencing high stress on specific muscle groups.
sport.desc_5: Provides both physical and psychological benefits by promoting relaxation, reducing stress and anxiety, and improving mood and overall well-being.
sport.desc_6: Enhances movement coordination and reduces the risk of overuse injuries, which is crucial for athletes aiming for precision and efficiency in their training.

aboutUsTitle.title: We create an atmosphere of relaxation and care for your health, helping you relieve tension, stress, and fatigue.
aboutUsTitle.askTitle: If you have any questions, fill out the form, and we will get in touch with you!
aboutUsTitle.responseText: Thank you for reaching out! We will contact you as soon as possible!

contactsPage.byAppointment: By appointment via phone or online booking

faqPage.ask_1: How often can I get a massage?
faqPage.answer_1: The frequency of massages depends on individual needs and health condition. It is optimal to have a massage once or twice a week, or as needed.
faqPage.ask_2: What are the benefits of massage for health?
faqPage.answer_2: Massage can help relax muscles, relieve tension, improve blood circulation, alleviate pain, and enhance overall well-being.
faqPage.ask_3: What are the contraindications for massage?
faqPage.answer_3: Contraindications may include acute infections, inflammatory processes, thrombosis, cancer, and other conditions. It is recommended to consult with a doctor before having a massage.
faqPage.ask_4: Can I get a massage during pregnancy?
faqPage.answer_4: Massage during pregnancy can be beneficial but requires special care and caution.
faqPage.ask_5: What is a classic body massage?
faqPage.answer_5: A classic body massage is a full-body massage that helps relax muscles, improve circulation, and relieve stress.
faqPage.ask_6: What are the benefits of back and neck massage?
faqPage.answer_6: A back and neck massage helps relieve tension, improve circulation, and reduce pain in the neck and back.
faqPage.ask_7: How should I prepare for a massage?
faqPage.answer_7: Before the massage, it is recommended to take a shower, remove any jewelry, relax, and inform the massage therapist about your preferences and any issues.
faqPage.ask_8: How do I choose the right type of massage for a specific problem (e.g., back pain, stress)?
faqPage.answer_8: It is best to consult with a massage therapist who can recommend a massage based on your needs and concerns. For example, a therapeutic massage is suitable for relieving back pain, while a relaxing massage is ideal for overall relaxation.
faqPage.ask_9: Can I exercise after a massage?
faqPage.answer_9: After a relaxing massage, you can return to physical activity immediately. After a sports massage, it is recommended to rest for a few hours.
faqPage.answer_10: Yes, a head, neck, and shoulder massage can relieve tension, reduce the frequency of headaches, and improve circulation.
faqPage.ask_11: Can massage aid in weight loss?
faqPage.answer_11: Anti-cellulite and lymphatic drainage massages can help reduce volume and speed up metabolic processes, which may support the weight loss process.
faqPage.ask_12: Which massage is best for boosting immunity?
faqPage.answer_12: Lymphatic drainage massage helps strengthen immunity by removing toxins and improving lymph circulation.
faqPage.ask_13: Can massage reduce swelling in the legs?
faqPage.answer_13: Yes, lymphatic drainage massage helps eliminate excess fluid and reduce swelling in the legs.
faqPage.ask_14: Can I combine massage with other treatments, such as body wraps?
faqPage.answer_14: Yes, massage is often combined with other treatments like body wraps to enhance the effect of skin cleansing and hydration.
faqPage.ask_15: Is it okay to get a massage during menstruation?
faqPage.answer_15: Yes, massage can be done during menstruation, but it is best to avoid deep pressure on the abdomen and lower back.

privacyPolicy.massage_parlor: 1.1 The massage parlor 'Alexandra' (hereinafter referred to as 'we', 'us', 'the parlor') is committed to protecting the privacy of visitors to our website. Therefore, we have prepared this privacy policy to show visitors to our site that our parlor:
privacyPolicy.complies_protection_laws: – complies with data protection laws and follows best practices in data protection;
privacyPolicy.openly_discloses: – openly discloses how it stores and processes personal data;
privacyPolicy.protects_itself: – protects itself from the risks of data leakage.
privacyPolicy.privacy_policy_applies: 1.2 This privacy policy applies when we act as a data controller regarding the personal data of visitors to our website; in other words, when we determine the purposes and means of processing this personal data.
privacyPolicy.we_collect_personal_data: 2. How we collect your personal data
privacyPolicy.collect_personal_data_when: 2.1 We collect your personal data when you provide it directly to us by filling out any forms on our website. Please do not provide us with personal data of others.
privacyPolicy.use_analytics_tracking: 2.2 Additionally, we, like many companies, may use tracking analytics systems (e.g., Google Analytics) to automatically collect certain information about you when you visit our website.
privacyPolicy.knowingly_collect_personal_data: 2.3 We do not knowingly collect personal data from children under the age of 18 without obtaining parental consent. If you are under 18, please do not use our website or access it at any time or in any way. If we learn that personal data has been collected from individuals under the age of 18 without verifiable parental consent, we will take appropriate steps to delete this information.
privacyPolicy.use_your_personal_data: 3. How we use your personal data
privacyPolicy.we_set_out: 3.1 In this section, we set out:
privacyPolicy.general_categories: – the general categories of personal data that we may process;
privacyPolicy.purposes_for_which: – the purposes for which we may process personal data;
privacyPolicy.do_not_process_personal: We do not process your personal data in a manner incompatible with the purposes outlined below. We collect personal data in accordance with the principles of data minimization and retention limitation.
privacyPolicy.usage_data: 3.2 We may process usage data regarding your use of our website ('usage data'). Usage data may include the IP address, browser, and operating system used to connect your computer to the Internet, information about the pages you visit, and how you navigate through the website, including the duration of visits to certain pages, products, and services you viewed and searched for, referral sources (e.g., how you came to our website), your gender and age, preferences, and information about the time, frequency, and nature of your use of our website. The source of usage data is the tracking analytics systems we use (e.g., Google Analytics). This usage data may be processed for the purpose of analyzing website usage. The legal basis for such processing is our legitimate interests, namely monitoring and improving our website and services.
privacyPolicy.enquiry_data: 3.3 We may process information contained in any inquiry you send us regarding our products and/or services ('enquiry data'). Enquiry data may include your name, surname, patronymic, and contact details. Enquiry data may be processed for the purposes of offering, marketing, and selling you relevant products and/or services. The legal basis for such processing is your explicit consent, voluntarily provided.
privacyPolicy.customer_relationship_data: 3.4 We may process information regarding our relationship with clients, including client contact information ('customer relationship data'). Customer relationship data may include your name, contact details, and information contained in communications between us and you. The source of customer relationship data is you. Customer relationship data may be processed for the purpose of managing our client relationships, communicating with clients, maintaining records of such communications, and promoting our products and services among clients. The legal basis for such processing is our legitimate interests, namely the proper management of our client relationships.
privacyPolicy.necessary_establishment: 3.5 We may process any of your personal data specified in this privacy policy when necessary for the establishment, exercise, or defense of legal claims, whether in judicial, administrative, or extrajudicial proceedings. The legal basis for such processing is our legitimate interests, namely the protection and assertion of our legal rights, your legal rights, and the legal rights of others.
privacyPolicy.specific_purposes: 3.6 In addition to the specific purposes for which we may process your personal data, outlined in this Section 3, we may also process any of your personal data if such processing is necessary for compliance with a legal obligation to which we are subject, or for the protection of vital interests of any individual.
privacyPolicy.balance_potential_impact: 3.7 When we lawfully process your personal data, we consider and weigh any potential impact on you (both positive and negative) and your rights under data protection laws. We will not use your personal data where our interests are overridden by the impact on you, for example, when the use would be excessively intrusive (e.g., when we are not required or permitted by law to do so).
privacyPolicy.providing_data_others: 4. Providing your personal data to third parties
privacyPolicy.do_not_sell_information: 4.1 We do not sell or rent your personal data to third parties.
privacyPolicy.do_not_share: 4.2 We do not transfer your personal data to third parties for marketing purposes.
privacyPolicy.international_transfer: 5. International transfer of your personal data
privacyPolicy.data_provided_to_us: 5.1 All data provided by you to us is used exclusively within the territory of the Republic of Belarus and is not transferred outside the territorial boundaries of the Republic of Belarus.
privacyPolicy.you_have_the_right: 6.1 You have the right of access, which means you have the right to know exactly what personal data of yours is stored and how it is processed. Therefore, you have the right to confirm whether we process your personal data or not, and if we do, to access the personal data along with certain additional information. This additional information includes detailed information about the purposes of processing, the categories of personal data concerned, and the recipients of the personal data. Provided that the rights and freedoms of others are not affected, we will provide you with a copy of your personal data. The first copy will be provided free of charge, but a reasonable fee may be charged for additional copies.
privacyPolicy.right_rectification: 6.2 You have the right to rectification, which means you have the right to correct personal data if they are inaccurate or incomplete.
privacyPolicy.right_erasure: 6.3 You have the right to erasure, which means that in certain circumstances you have the right to delete or remove your personal data without the need to specify a specific reason for wanting to cease the action. Such circumstances include:
privacyPolicy.no_longer_necessary: – the personal data is no longer necessary for the purposes for which it was collected or otherwise processed; or
privacyPolicy.withdraw_consent: – you withdraw consent for processing based on consent; or
privacyPolicy.object_processing: – you object to processing in accordance with the specific provisions of applicable data protection law; or
privacyPolicy.processed_unlawfully: – the personal data has been processed unlawfully.
privacyPolicy.exceptions_right_erasure: Please note, there are certain exceptions to the right of erasure. Clear exceptions include cases where processing is necessary for compliance with legal obligations or for the establishment, exercise, or defense of legal claims.
privacyPolicy.right_restrict_processing: 6.4 You have the right to restrict processing, which means that in certain cases you have the right to stop or prohibit the processing of your personal data. These situations include the following:
privacyPolicy.dispute_the_accuracy: – you dispute the accuracy of your personal data — we require time to verify the accuracy of the data; or
privacyPolicy.processing_unlawful: – the processing may be unlawful, but you object to the erasure of your data and request a restriction on the processing of your personal data; or
privacyPolicy.no_need_personal_data: – the personal data is no longer needed for processing purposes, but may still be necessary for the establishment, exercise, or defense of legal claims.
privacyPolicy.processing_has_been_restricted: If processing is restricted for any of these reasons, we may still retain your personal data. However, we will only process it with your consent or if necessary for the establishment, exercise, or defense of legal claims.
privacyPolicy.right_to_object_data: 6.5 If we process your personal data for direct marketing purposes, scientific or historical research, or public interest purposes, you have the right to object to the processing. If you object, we will stop processing your personal data unless we have legitimate grounds for the processing that override your rights and freedoms or if the processing is necessary for the establishment, exercise, or defense of legal claims.
privacyPolicy.right_to_data_portability: 6.6 You have the right to data portability, meaning you have the right to receive your personal data from us in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format. You also have the right to transmit this data directly to another controller if the processing is based on your consent and carried out by automated means.
privacyPolicy.right_to_complaint: 6.7 If you believe we have violated the laws concerning the processing of your personal data, you have the right to lodge a complaint with the relevant data protection authorities.
privacyPolicy.may_exercise_rights: 6.8 You may exercise all your rights related to your personal data by sending a written request via email.
privacyPolicy.choice_receive_information: 6.9 You have the right to choose whether or not to receive information from us. If you do not wish to receive direct marketing communications, you can notify us via email.
privacyPolicy.saving_deleting_data: 7. Storing and Deleting Your Personal Data
privacyPolicy.data_retention_policies: 7.1 This section 7 outlines our data retention policies and procedures, designed to help us ensure compliance with our legal obligations regarding the retention and deletion of personal data.
privacyPolicy.kept_longer: 7.2 Personal data that we process for any purposes or tasks should not be kept longer than necessary for the purposes for which it was collected.
privacyPolicy.store_data: 7.3 We will store your personal data as follows:
privacyPolicy.data_collected: – data about usage collected via Google Analytics will be stored for 26 months;
privacyPolicy.stored_for_interested: – query data will be kept as long as you may be interested in purchasing our relevant products and services. It will be deleted within 3 (three) business days after you explicitly notify us via email that you are no longer interested in our products and/or services and withdraw your consent for processing your query data, without affecting the lawfulness of processing based on consent before its withdrawal.
privacyPolicy.retain_data: Notwithstanding other provisions of this section 7, we may retain your personal data if such retention is necessary for compliance with legal obligations to which we are subject, or for the protection of your vital interests or the vital interests of another individual.
privacyPolicy.appropriate_technical: 8.1 When you provide us with personal data, we take steps to ensure that appropriate technical and organizational measures are in place to protect it.
privacyPolicy.transferred_via_internet: 8.2 Non-confidential data (your email address, etc.) is usually transmitted via the Internet, and its security cannot be 100% guaranteed. We cannot guarantee the security of any information you transmit to us. We also cannot guarantee that such information will not be accessed, disclosed, altered, or destroyed as a result of a breach of any of our physical, technical, or managerial security measures. Therefore, while we strive to protect your personal data, we cannot guarantee the security of any information you transmit to us, and you do so at your own risk.
privacyPolicy.accepted_industry_standards: 8.3 We follow widely accepted industry standards to protect the information you provide to us both during transmission and after its receipt. We maintain appropriate administrative, technical, and physical security measures to protect personal data from accidental or unlawful destruction, accidental loss, unauthorized alteration, unauthorized disclosure or access, misuse, and any other unlawful form of processing of personal data under our control. This includes, for example, firewalls, password protection, and other access control and authentication measures. We use SSL technology to encrypt data during transmission over the public Internet.
privacyPolicy.electronic_storage: 8.4 However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. If you believe your personal data has been compromised, please contact us.
privacyPolicy.security_breach: 8.5 If we become aware of a security breach, we will inform you and the authorities of the breach in accordance with applicable laws.
privacyPolicy.file_containing: 9.1 A cookie is a file containing an identifier (a string of letters and numbers) that is sent by a web server to the web browser and stored by the browser. The identifier is then sent back to the server every time the browser requests a page from the server. Cookies typically do not contain any information that identifies the user's identity, but personal data that we store about you may be linked to the information stored in the cookies and obtained from them.
privacyPolicy.before_using_website: 9.2 Before you start using our website, you are informed that we use cookies. You can agree to this use of cookies. Then, you can either continue using our website by giving your voluntary consent or delete the cookies by following the instructions provided on the relevant websites (listed below), and return to using our website when you have deleted the cookies and are ready to continue. Thus, you use our site either with cookies (for which you have given explicit consent) or without cookies by deleting them from the browser yourself.
privacyPolicy.use_cookies: We use cookies for the following purposes:
privacyPolicy.authentication: – authentication – we use cookies to identify you when you visit our website and when you navigate through it;
privacyPolicy.analysis: – analysis – we use cookies that help us analyze the usage and performance of our website.
privacyPolicy.stored_on_computer: 9.3 Our tracking systems use cookies, and these cookies may be stored on your computer when you visit our website.
privacyPolicy.do_not_want_cookies: 9.4 If you refuse to use cookies when visiting our website, you can delete the cookies. You can do this before using our website or at any time after using it.
privacyPolicy.blocking_all_cookies: Blocking all cookies may negatively affect the usability of our website.
privacyPolicy.update_privacy_policy: 10.1 We may update this privacy policy from time to time by posting a new version on our website.
privacyPolicy.check_this_page: 10.2 You should check this page periodically to ensure that you are satisfied with any changes to this privacy policy.

membershipPage.certificateTitle: Give the gift of care and relaxation with our massage certificates!
membershipPage.certificateDesc: A certificate is a wonderful way to show you care for your loved ones, friends, or colleagues. Let them enjoy relaxing massage treatments that help them unwind, relieve stress, and restore energy. With a massage certificate, you give not only pleasant sensations but also care for the health and well-being of those close to you. Choose from various certificate options and create a unique gift that will be both valuable and memorable.
membershipPage.subscriptionTitle: Regular massage sessions are even more accessible with our convenient subscriptions
membershipPage.subscriptionDesc: Subscriptions provide the opportunity to receive high-quality massage treatments at an affordable price, enjoying positive effects for both your body and soul. With a massage subscription, you can regularly take care of your health and well-being, enjoying pleasant and relaxing treatments.
